text: int main ( ) { int n , k , l , i , j , a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , max , ans [ 100 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & k ) ; for ( l = 1 ; l <= k ; l ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { if ( j == 0 ) a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] += a [ i ] [ j ] ; if ( j == i ) a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] += a [ i ] [ j ] ; if ( j < i ) a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] += ( ( a [ i ] [ j ] > a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ) ? a [ i ] [ j ] : a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ) ; } } max = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( max < a [ n - 1 ] [ i ] ) max = a [ n - 1 ] [ i ] ; } ans [ l ] = max ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < k ; i ++ ) printf ( "\n%d" , ans [ i ] ) ; printf ( "\n" ) ; return 0 ; }
